title: Professional networks include care economy perspective
description: Professional networks include care economy perspective
content:
Scenario: Professional networks include care economy perspective
    Given Robert participates in professional networks and associations
    And professional networks often ignore care economy
    And his networks could advance care economy professionally
    When workplace_elohim supports professional network engagement
    Then it should help Robert bring care economy perspective to professional networks
    And support him in advocating within professional associations
    And help him connect with other care economy professionals
    And build professional networks that normalize care economy principles
    And advance care economy through professional channels
    And demonstrate that all professions can adopt care economy lens
    And spread care economy principles through professional influence
